description: This Dart source file defines the AttendanceProvider class, which manages attendance data for a kindergarten management system. It interacts with a database service to load, add, update, and retrieve attendance records, and notifies UI components of changes via ChangeNotifier.

classes.name: AttendanceProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class providing attendance data management for the application's state, including loading, updating, and retrieving attendance records.

methods.name: loadAttendance
methods.description: Asynchronously loads attendance data from the database, optionally filtered by date.

methods.name: markAttendance
methods.description: Adds a new attendance record to the database and updates the internal list.

methods.name: updateAttendance
methods.description: Updates an existing attendance record in the database and internal list.

methods.name: getAttendanceForDate
methods.description: Retrieves attendance records for a specific day.

methods.name: getAttendanceForStudent
methods.description: Retrieves attendance record for a specific student on a given date.

methods.name: getAttendanceStats
methods.description: Provides a count of attendance records per status for a specified date.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Sets the loading state and notifies listeners.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cleans up resources and flags the provider as disposed.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Resets the current error state and notifies listeners.
